DOC.brief_summary: To provide azithromycin treatment individual patient proven cryptosporidiosis whose disease persist progressed despite prior therapy .
DOC.brief_title: Azithromycin Treatment Cryptosporidiosis Patients Who Have Not Had Success With Other Drugs
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Patients must : Cryptosporidiosis infection . Life expectancy least 1 week . Failed intolerant prior therapy standard antidiarrheal antibiotic therapy cryptosporidiosis . Consent parent guardian patient legal age consent . Patients document favorable response azithromycin Pfizer protocol 066143 may receive maintenance therapy protocol . Patients persistent diarrhea require intravenous ( IV ) fluid therapy maintain hydration may receive IV azithromycin approval clinical monitor . Patients whose disease worsen despite minimum 2 week oral therapy patient whose disease show improvement 4 week oral therapy also consider trial period intravenous azithromycin . Exclusion Criteria Coexisting Condition : Patients follow symptoms condition exclude : Known hypersensitivity significant intolerance macrolide antibiotic . Eligibility current treatment medical center perform study 066143 , another study azithromycin treatment cryptosporidiosis AIDS patient . Required : Must fail intolerant prior therapy standard antidiarrheal antibiotic therapy cryptosporidiosis .
